attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is an ancient clause order by Royal decreed  that any future building should not be over a certain hight and the views are not to be obscured. This is not public knowledge. But plans by Tottenham Hotspurs Football Club to build a Massive Stadim doesn't take this into consideration. The next meeting is on the 12th November 2007 will this be stemrolled through with no regard to this decree

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
